content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

Weddings are allowed to happen. There can be a maximum of 30 people present if the ceremony is held inside and 50 people if it is held outside, including the couple, the officiator and the registrar.

The wedding receptions can be held in a restaurant or other catering facility. Such receptions shall be held no longer than the day after the ceremony. For reception a limit of 30 people present applies. Restaurants must follow specific hygiene rules as well as close at 8 PM. 

During the reception follow the general hygienic regulations, even during the consuming of food and the toast.

During the ceremony, there is an exception from the obligation to wear a face mask. You have to put your mask back on once the ceremony is over. You can only take it off for the necessary amount of time when taking a photo.

Weddings are allowed to happen but there is a limited amount of guests and it is necessary to follow all hygienic regulations. It is up to you whether you want to get married now or wait until a better epidemiological situation. Once the risk of infection is lower, these rules will be less strict.

questions_answers.question: Is the couple part of the 30/50 person limit?
Is the officiator part of the 30/50 person limit?
Can I have a wedding if I'm in isolation or quarantine?
questions_answers.value: No. When in quarantine or isolation, you have to be at home. You can get married once your quarantine is over.

questions_answers.question: Can I have guests from abroad at my wedding?
questions_answers.value: Yes, but you need to fit within the 30/50 person limit.

questions_answers.question: Can I have a wedding party in a restaurant?
questions_answers.value: Yes, but you must follow all the hygiene rules.

questions_answers.question: Can I have live music at the wedding reception?
Can I have my grandparents at my wedding?
questions_answers.value: Yes, but they are part of a higher risk group. Protect them from possible infection by disinfecting your hands, wearing a mask and social distancing.

update.processed: A maximum of 20 people is going to be able to be present at a wedding ceremony. Restaurants will be closed.
